title: Need carrying! Silver 3 last season!
body:
I need a duo/team to play ranked with. Add me if interested! Must be committed & play regularly! 
- AngusRoxyRuby1

replies.body:
remove angus from your name and im sure you'll get many boys coming to your aid ^.>

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Haha Angus isnt my real name so maybe im a grill! ;) ^.>
